Programme for European Traffic with Highest Efficiency and Unprecedented Safety 具有最高效率和空前安全性的欧洲交通计划

sentence.Network_en: Prometheus bestowed on his creation the gift of fire, which raised man above all animals.
sentence.Network_cn: 普罗米修斯又赠给他火, 从而使人类进化成为万物之灵.

sentence.Network_en: Prometheus faced his bitter fate firmly and never quailed before all the fiery majesty of Zeus.
sentence.Network_cn: 面对宙斯的严刑与威严,普罗米修斯坚定地面对苦难的命运,毫不畏缩.

sentence.Network_en: However, Prometheus managed to steal fire from heaven and secretly brought it down to men.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而, 普罗米修斯却又想尽办法从天上把火盗来,并悄悄地将它带给人类.
